body: Is she just a complete idiot? First off, he tried pulling your panties off at work, which is sexual harassment (that is a workplace and law violation if you did not know). Second, just tell your husband that he is touching you at the table. Seriously, why not just tell him? Third, and I know he was unconscious from intoxication, but why not tell him in the morning? He was right at the door. What was the boss going to do? Hit you in front of his coworker? Like 7 Eyes said, I know it should not bother me this much, but when the plot is this idiotic, I just cannot help myself.
That poor girl. Did she enjoy it in the end?
